rangers_bow.name: Ranger's Bow
rangers_bow.description: A well-crafted hunting bow, worn smooth by years of use.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: Flexible protection made from treated animal hide.

survival_kit.name: Survival Kit
survival_kit.description: Contains basic tools for wilderness survival: rope, tinderbox, fishing hooks, and small knife.

healing_herbs.name: Healing Herbs
healing_herbs.description: A collection of medicinal plants that can restore minor wounds.

ceremonial_spear.name: Ceremonial Spear
ceremonial_spear.description: A spear blessed by the spirits, decorated with tribal markings.

spirit_totem.name: Spirit Totem
spirit_totem.description: A carved wooden totem that allows communication with ancestral spirits.

scholars_robes.name: Scholar's Robes
scholars_robes.description: Fine robes marking you as a student of the Great Library.

arcane_focus.name: Arcane Focus
arcane_focus.description: A crystal that helps channel magical energies.
